title: Spanish restaurants in Berlin
description: Spent the evening researching Spanish restaurants around Berlin, hoping to find flavors that remind me of home while settling into a new country.

mood.reason: Finding familiar food abroad brings comfort and a sense of belonging.

title: Visit Brandenburg Gate
description: Visited the iconic Brandenburg Gate and felt a sense of awe experiencing such a historic place in my new home.

mood.reason: Exploring famous landmarks makes living abroad feel real and rewarding.

title: Learn basic German phrases
description: Practiced basic German phrases to feel more confident handling everyday conversations.

mood.reason: Learning the local language helps me feel more independent.

title: Walk around Alexanderplatz
description: Took a long walk around Alexanderplatz, observing the rhythm of daily life in the city.

mood.reason: Exploring unfamiliar places always sparks curiosity.

title: Gym workout session
description: Went to the gym to release stress and keep a healthy routine while adapting to life abroad.

mood.reason: Exercise gave me a strong boost of energy and confidence.

title: Cooking pasta night
description: Cooked pasta at home, enjoying a quiet night and practicing simple comfort cooking.

mood.reason: Cooking something familiar helped me unwind.

title: Portfolio coding day
description: Spent the day coding and improving my portfolio to support future career goals.

mood.reason: Deep work sessions make me feel productive and purposeful.

title: Movie night
description: Stayed in for a cozy movie night to recharge socially and mentally.

mood.reason: A calm night helped me relax after busy days.

title: Visit museum
description: Visited a museum and enjoyed learning about local history and culture.

mood.reason: Art and history always leave me feeling inspired.

title: Meet friends for coffee
description: Met friends for coffee and enjoyed meaningful conversations.

mood.reason: Connecting with people makes me feel supported.

title: React practice
description: Practiced React concepts and built small components to improve my skills.

mood.reason: Learning new skills feels empowering.

title: Go for a run
description: Went for a refreshing run to clear my mind and enjoy the outdoors.

mood.reason: Running helps reset my thoughts.

title: Read a book
description: Spent quiet time reading a book and disconnecting from screens.

mood.reason: Reading brings mental peace.

title: Study JavaScript
description: Reviewed JavaScript fundamentals to strengthen my programming foundation.

mood.reason: Consistent learning keeps me on track.

title: Bike ride
description: Went for a bike ride around the city, enjoying freedom and fresh air.

mood.reason: Cycling made me feel light and unrestricted.

title: Photography walk
description: Took my camera out and captured moments around the city.

mood.reason: Photography lets me express myself visually.

title: Watch tutorial videos
description: Watched online tutorials to learn new techniques and concepts.

mood.reason: Learning keeps me growing.

title: Clean apartment
description: Cleaned the apartment and organized my space.

mood.reason: A clean space improves my mental clarity.

title: Grocery shopping
description: Did grocery shopping and explored local food options.

mood.reason: Routine tasks help build structure.

title: Yoga session
description: Practiced yoga to stretch, breathe, and relax.

mood.reason: Yoga helped calm my mind.

title: Update CV
description: Updated my CV to reflect recent skills and experiences.

mood.reason: Preparing for future opportunities feels empowering.

title: Networking online
description: Reached out to people online to expand my professional network.

mood.reason: Making connections opens new possibilities.
